message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $14000?

I understand that $18000 might be a stretch for you, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go all the way down to $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offer and your counteroffer. I'll offer you the product for $16500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that $16500 is still a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go all the way down to $13500. I'll offer you the product for $15000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's a great deal considering the value of the product. What do you think?
